channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Vodka Becomes Available For Pre-Orders After 13-Year Hiatus
item.description: The spirit is the latest licensed product to be marketed under the Trump name branding.

item.title: AI Agents And Workplace Culture Impact Enterprise Software
item.description: Discover how AI agents, evolving business models, and workplace culture will reshape enterprise software by 2026, driving innovation and productivity.

item.title: Progress In Fight Against Malaria, As New Treatment Shows Promise
item.description: The anti-malarial GanLum's Phase 3 data highlight the drug’s potential to further combat the threat of antimalarial drug resistance in Africa.
